inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Shortbow', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Longbow', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Master Training, Bows
description: You do an additional 1x damage on critical hits with shortbows and longbows.
